lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic cruised into the Shanghai Masters third round with a 6-3 6-3 win over Italy's Fabio Fognini on Tuesday, the Serbian's first match since his loss to Stan Wawrinka in last month's U.S. Open final.
